# About Django TokkoRPC
_ToDo_

# Install
```bash
# Virtual Environment
(venv) pip install tokko_rpc==0.0.2
# Main Python3 environment
sudo -H pip3 install tokko_rpc==0.0.2
```

# Testing
```bash
python ./manage.py test django_tokko_rpc
```
